Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by Detroit in 1994...
Traded from Detroit to Los Angeles on 5/19/1995 (Going to LA: 2B T. Walker. Going to DET: P S. Garrelts, P E. Hanson, C J. Kendall)...
Injured on 7/8/1995 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1996, off David Cone (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/1996, off Mike Williams (CIN)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Chicago (N) on 5/3/1997...
Injured on 7/27/1997 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 5/7/1998...
Had 6 hits with 5 RBI against Chicago (N) on 5/9/1998...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1998, hitting .548 with 1 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1998 Allstar game...
